sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

// material-ui
import { CardContent, Checkbox, FormControlLabel, Grid, MenuItem, TextField } from '@material-ui/core';

// project imports
import { gridSpacing } from 'store/constant';
import SubCard from 'ui-component/cards/SubCard';
import MaskedInput from 'react-text-mask';

const ReferralSource = () => (
    <SubCard title='Source of Referral'>
        <CardContent>
            <Grid container spacing={gridSpacing}>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={12} lg={8} md={8}>


                    Source of Referral


                    Ability NB

                    Ambulatory Clinic (Outpatient)

                    Ambulance New Brunswick (ANB)

                    Community Health Centers

                    Specify: Nurse Practitioner or Family Physician

                    Department of Veteran Affairs

                    Emergency Department

                    Extra-Mural Program

                    Family Physician (Outside Community Health Centers)

                    First Nations

                    Specify: (textbox to specify)

                    Homecare Agency

                    Hospital (Inpatient)

                    Nursing Home

                    Specify: (textbox to specify)

                    Public Health Services

                    Residential Facility

                    Self-referral or Referral by Family Member

                    Social Development (text box to specify which department)

                    Home Adaptations for Seniors Independence Program

                    Homeowner Repair Program

                    Housing Program

                    Long-Term Care Program

                    Mobility and Adaptive Equipment Loan Program

                    Social Assistance Program

                    Other (textbox to specify)

                    Volunteer Organizations

                    Specify: (textbox to specify)

                    Other: (textbox to specify)
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </CardContent>
    </SubCard>
);

export default ReferralSource;
